title: Arnold & Porter and Kaye Scholer to Merge After All
description:
Arnold & Porter and Kaye Scholer, after months of talks, announced today that they will merge effective January 1, 2017. The new firm will have roughly 1,000 lawyers and will be called Arnold & Porter Kaye Scholer. Josh Block and Casey Sullivan discuss the largest law firm merger (so far) of 2016.

Sponsored by Bloomberg Law: 
www.bna.com/bloomberglaw?promocode=BLBBLAW

Subscribe to the Big Law Business podcast on iTunes:
itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/big-l…d1074067483?mt=2
